column1: # TODO: Allow initial position of Khanda Ta & Chillus
# Reject: Consonant + (Virama + Vowel Sign | Vowel Sign + Virama)
# TODO: This currently passes but a standalone chillu does
# not (See above). Choose one or the other.
# Independent æ vowel built with YA-phalaa
# TODO: ZWJ for YA-phalaa after KA should not be wellformed.
# Accepts Chillus/KHANDA TA with a preceding VIRAMA
# TODO: Investigate if the usage of ZWJs valid in here.
# That is, if <Consonant, VIRAMA, ZW(N)J, KHANDA TA> has a valid usage,
# please change wellformed acceptor to allow that specific usage.
# Corresponding change is needed in visual_norm as well.
# Reject: Of all the independent vowels, matras can only be applied to LETTER
# Reject: Consonant + (Virama + Vowel Sign | Vowel Sign + Virama):
# Reject: <LETTER KHOU, APUN IYEK, VOWEL SIGN UNAP>
# Reject: <LETTER KHOU, VOWEL SIGN UNAP, APUN IYEK>
# Reject: Lonsum can't start a word.
